CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingName)) , NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingStreet )) , NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingCity )) , NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingState )) , NOT(ISBLANK( ShippingPostalCode )) , NOT(ISBLANK( BillingName)) , NOT(ISBLANK(BillingStreet )) , NOT(ISBLANK(BillingCity )) , NOT(ISBLANK(BillingState )) , NOT(ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode )) )
CustomField.label: Required Fields Filled
